entry.title: Crypto.ro and Binance Unveil the 3rd Binance Meetup in Romania, Set in Timisoara
entry.summary:
Prepare for an exciting collaboration as Crypto.ro and Binance join forces to present the third Binance Meetup in Romania. Save the date for this thrilling event on May 30, 2023, in Timisoara, at Galla Events, located at 96 Dorobantilor Street.
This gathering offers a special opportunity to learn firsthand about Binance Romania and crypto.ro, trusted partners and collaborators of this meetup. Don’t miss out on this unique experience!
REZERVE YOUR TICKET NOW We welcome you with interactive activities, contests with attractive prizes, and many other surprises. Participants will have the chance to win various Binance promotional items (caps, T-shirts, etc.), enjoy offered drinks and take pictures alongside the Binance team.
Event agenda:
18:00 – 19:00: Check-in with ID/passport. Networking
19:00 – 19:10: Binance Romania – introduction
19:10 – 19:20: Federation of Emerging Technologies – presentation
19:20 – 19:30: Crypto.ro – learn more about crypto.ro
19:30 – 19:40: VD Law – presentation
19:40 – 19:50: Binance NFT – presentation
19:50 – 20:00: Binance VIP – presentation
20:00 – 21:00: Photos. Contests. Networking
REZERVE YOUR TICKET NOW The event is free to attend, but don’t forget to register. For live updates from the event on May 30, follow us on Twitter.

Fahrenheit Emerges Victorious, Acquires Celsius’ Assets In A Bidding War
entry.summary:
In a turn of events, cryptocurrency consortium Fahrenheit has emerged triumphant in a high-stakes bidding war, securing the acquisition of insolvent lender Celsius Network. The deal, which includes Celsius’s institutional loan portfolio, staked cryptocurrencies, mining units, and alternative investments, marks a significant development in the crypto industry.
Led by venture capital firm Arrington Capital and miner US Bitcoin Corp, the consortium’s victory is currently one of the trending news in the industry as the acquisition was of the recently bankrupted crypto lender Celsius which resulted in losses for some investors.
After a rigorous auction process, Fahrenheit, backed by Arrington Capital, emerged as the successful bidder, outmaneuvering rival bidders NovaWulf and the Blockcha…

entry.title: Russian Crypto Exchange Co-Founder Eyes Release Via ‘Prisoner Swap’ – Report
entry.summary:
Crypto exchange BTC-e co-founder Alexander Vinnik, who is currently facing charges related to his involvement in an alleged illegal cryptocurrency exchange, has taken a unique approach to secure his release.
As revealed in a recent article from The Wall Street Journal, Vinnik’s attorney is actively seeking to modify a protective order in his client’s case, aiming to facilitate his inclusion in a prisoner exchange between Russia and the United States.
If successful, this exchange could involve the substitution of Vinnik for detained WSJ journalist Evan Gershkovich.
Vinnik’s Lawyer Argues For Accused’s Right To Advocate For Prisoner Swap
In a recent court hearing, a lawyer representing Vinnik put forth an argument seeking Vinnik’s opportunity to address the accusations against…

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Hotbit Says ‘Deteriorating Conditions’ Forced It to Stop Operations
entry.summary:
China-headquartered cryptocurrency exchange, Hotbit, said on May 22 it had made the decision to halt “all cex operations.” The crypto exchange pointed to the “continuous outflows of funds from cex [centralized exchange] users” as one of the many factors that forced Hotbit to stop operations.
The Crypto Industry’s ‘Deteriorating Conditions’
The Asian cryptocurrency exchange, Hotbit, recently said it was shutting down the platform due to what it characterized as “deteriorating conditions” in the crypto industry. According to a statement issued by the exchange on May 22, these conditions have, in turn, resulted in the “continuous outflows of funds from cex [centralized exchange] users, including Hotbit, and deteriorating cash flow.”
In addition to dealing with capital outflows and reduc…

entry.title: Study: Africa Likely to Leapfrog Leading Fintech Regions if It Adopts New Technologies
entry.summary:
Africa will likely leapfrog the top fintech regions if startups on the continent adopt new technologies, the Global Fintech 2023 report by the Boston Consulting Group and QED Investors has said. The report points to the African continent’s young population as well as the projected population growth of 1.2 billion more inhabitants by 2050.
Overcoming Africa’s Financial Exclusion Woes
According to the Global Fintech 2023 report by the Boston Consulting Group and QED Investors, Africa and the Middle East are likely to leapfrog established fintech centers if they adopt new technologies. The report also noted that while cash is “still king” in Africa, fintech startups are ideally positioned to solve the continent’s financial exclusion woes. By overcoming this, the fintechs will help make A…

entry.title: Elon Musk Warns Against Buying And Betting Big On Dogecoin – Here’s Why
entry.summary:
Elon Musk, the enigmatic tech entrepreneur and CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, has once again caused a stir in the cryptocurrency arena. Known for his influential presence on social media, Musk recently shared his latest perspective on the popular digital currency, Dogecoin.
The tweet and and public statements made by Elon Musk have long had a profound impact on the volatile cryptocurrency market, with his endorsement or criticism capable of sending digital assets soaring or plummeting in value.
In a surprising turn of events, Musk altered the crypto narrative by issuing a warning against buying and betting big on Dogecoin, a cryptocurrency that skyrocketed in value due to his previous endorsements.
Elon Musk: Change Of Perspective On Dogecoin
During a virtual conference in London, Mu…

entry.title: Ripple Acquires Undisclosed Stake in Crypto Exchange Bitstamp
entry.summary:
The San Francisco-based blockchain company, Ripple has taken an undisclosed minority stake in the cryptocurrency exchange, Bitstamp in the first quarter of this year, according to the latest transcript of Galaxy Digital’s shareholder conference call.
Ripple Buys Bitstamp Stake
Ripple acquired the stakes from Pantera Capital, a US-based digital asset investment firm, and Galaxy Digital advised on the deal.
“On the back of a record year for our investment banking team, we advised Pantera, a leading blockchain asset management firm on the sale of its stake in European digital asset exchange Bitstamp to Ripple Labs in Q1,” the meeting’s transcript noted.
“Executing on a deal with this complexity, post-FTX, reinforces our position as a leading investment bank for digital assets with…

entry.title: From Silicon Valley to London: Winklevoss Twins Plot Crypto Pivot
entry.summary: Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, billionaire twins known for alleging that Mark Zuckerberg stole their idea for the creation of Facebook, are planning to move their cryptocurrency business from the United States to another location. Citing 'hostile' conditions in the United States, they are considering transferring the operations of the cryptocurrency exchange Gemini to the City of London, one of the most important financial capitals of the world. Gemini Considers Relocation to the UK As The Telegraph reported this week, the twins met with representatives of the UK's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) and the local central bank to discuss the potential of launching their operations in the UK. Gemini has no intention of leaving the United States entirely. Based on the sta…

entry.title: Binance CEO Claims Chinese Communities Are ‘Buzzing’ After CCTV Airs Crypto Segment
entry.summary:
On May 24, Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao, also known as CZ, shared through Twitter that “Chinese speaking communities are buzzing” following a news broadcast by state-operated media network China Central Television (CCTV) regarding Hong Kong’s latest cryptocurrency-focused regulatory policy.
CCTV’s Coverage of Hong Kong’s Crypto Regulations Sparks Excitement, Says Binance CEO; Nanxin University Launches Metaverse Platform
This week CZ emphasized that the coverage of cryptocurrencies by CCTV is significant, especially considering that crypto asset businesses were prohibited in China in September 2021. The Binance boss stated: “CCTV (China Central Television) just broadcasted crypto — It’s a big deal — The Chinese speaking communities are buzzing. Historically, coverages like these led to b…

He explains how Web3 can help creators to find funding and create new ways to interact with the audience.

entry.title: Immutable's Chris Clay: Crypto Can Solve the 'Dreaded Rollback' in MMORPGs
entry.summary: Immutable VP and Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how Immutable is actually immutable—and how that changes everything for both developers and players.

entry.title: Gary Vee Discusses the Rise and Impact of AI
entry.summary: During VeeCon 2023, entrepreneur spoke with Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about the rise of AI tools, what excites him about the technology, and what kind of impact he thinks it will have on creators and business.

entry.title: Gary Vee Discusses VeeCon 2023's Broader Shift Beyond Web3
entry.summary: VeeCon is back in 2023, moving from Minneapolis to Indianapolis, and creator and entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk joined Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss his aim to make it the "coolest business conference in the world." And that means expanding the focus beyond NFTs and Web3 to include AI and other tech innovations, along with broader business and pop culture content.

entry.title: Gary Vee on the NFT Market and Why 'NFTs Are Stuffed Animals'
entry.summary: Gary Vaynerchuk called the NFT market decline back in 2021, but the owner of CryptoPunks and other valuable tokenized assets still believes that a sustainable market will eventually form. He joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward amid VeeCon 2023 to discuss why he thinks the NFT space will be comparable to collectible sports cards, art, and even stuffed animals.

entry.title: What Immutable's Chris Clay Learned in 23 Years of Game Development
entry.summary: Immutable VP & Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what it's like to work in the game industry for decades and why he's not giving up on NFT games.

entry.summary: "Each game is a miracle," says Azra Games CEO Mark Otero. In this clip, he shares his thoughts on "play-to-earn" games and gamer motivation with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: How Mirandus is Innovating Video Game Audio

entry.title: gm: Avenged Sevenfold's M. Shadows on Deathbats, Fandom, and AI
entry.summary: Avenged Sevenfold lead singer Matt Sanders, aka M. Shadows, is rehearsing for the band's upcoming tour. He's also figuring out how to upend what it means to be a music fan. The band launched a Deathbats Club NFT collection in 2021. That is to say: They were early. The lead singer said it was timed to give fans a chance to get comfortable with Web3 technology ahead of the group's 2023 tour, when the NFT holders can use their Deathbats for early access to tickets. M. Shadows also talked to hosts Andrew Hayward and Stephen Graves about AI and bringing Web3 into gaming.

entry.title: Inside Mojo Melee's Lore with Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella
entry.summary: At the Game Developers' Conference, Mojo Melee Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their autobattler game and its unique characters, which are also NFTs on Polygon.
